product_summary: Hackules is an AI-powered software development platform that helps businesses build websites and software faster and cheaper. By using AI and automation, Hackules can reduce development time and costs by 25%. Some of the key features of Hackules include a no-code web builder, AI code generator, AI code commentator, AI security tester, and auto SEO.
product_cons: May not be suitable for complex software projects
Can be expensive for small businesses
AI-generated code may not always be perfect

product_usecases.details: Hackules' no-code web builder makes it easy to build a website without any coding experience. Simply drag and drop elements to create your desired layout and design.
Hackules' AI code generator can automatically generate code for you based on your specifications. This can save you a lot of time and effort, especially if you're not a programmer.
Hackules' AI code commentator can automatically add comments to your code, making it easier to understand and maintain.
Hackules' AI security tester can automatically test your code for security vulnerabilities, helping you to identify and fix potential security issues.
Hackules' auto SEO feature can automatically optimize your website for search engines, helping you to improve your visibility and organic traffic.

product_toolfor.details: Hackules can help web developers to build websites faster and cheaper, without sacrificing quality.
Hackules can help software developers to automate repetitive tasks, generate code, and test for security vulnerabilities.
Hackules can help businesses to reduce the cost and time of software development, and to improve the quality of their software products.
Hackules can help students to learn about software development and to build their own software projects.
Hackules can help hobbyists to build their own software projects, such as websites, games, and mobile apps.

product_pricing: Hackules offers three pricing plans: Basic, Professional, and Enterprise. The Basic plan starts at $199 per user per month, the Professional plan starts at $499 per user per month, and the Enterprise plan starts at $999 per user per month.
